favorites.title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
favorites.description: Mario and Luigi are whisked away to the colorful Mushroom Kingdom and must team up with Princess Peach to thwart Bowser's plans. Through high-speed chases and epic battles, they learn that brotherhood conquers all.

favorites.title: Almost Cops
favorites.description: Two lifelong friends decide to become real cops after playing officer in their neighborhood, only to find themselves hilariously unprepared. Through chaotic misadventures and unexpected heroism, they learn the true meaning of duty.

favorites.title: KPop Demon Hunters
favorites.description: A group of K-pop idols doubles as demon hunters, balancing glittering performances with supernatural battles. As they protect Seoul from evil forces, they navigate fame, friendship, and the weight of their hidden powers.

favorites.title: Toy Story
favorites.description: When Andy's old toys fear replacement, Woody embarks on a rescue mission with Buzz Lightyear after being separated from the toy box. In their adventure, they learn about friendship, loyalty, and finding one's place in the world.

favorites.title: The Boy and the Heron
cast: Luca Padovan, Christian Bale, Dave Bautista
favorites.description: A boy's surreal journey with a talking heron in a fantasy world.

favorites.id: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One-2023-netflix
favorites.title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
favorites.description: Ethan Hunt embarks on a globe-spanning quest to retrieve a rogue AI before it ignites global chaos. Faced with shifting alliances and high-octane stunts, he must rely on his resourcefulness and team to succeed.

favorites.title: The Hunt
favorites.description: Twelve strangers awaken in a clearing, hunted for sport by faceless elites. As they fight back, a journalist uncovers the sinister political agenda driving the deadly game.

favorites.title: Bird Box
favorites.description: In a world where unseen entities drive people to violence when looked at, a mother and her children embark on a blindfolded river journey. Battling unseen terrors, they cling to hope and each other to survive.
